remarks: Distributive law for Hilbert space operator difference.  (Interestingly, the reverse distributive law ~ hocsubdiri does not require linearity.) (Contributed by NM, 23-Aug-2006.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: hoddi $p |- ( ( R e. LinOp /\ S : ~H --> ~H /\ T : ~H --> ~H ) -> ( R o. ( S -op T ) ) = ( ( R o. S ) -op ( R o. T ) ) ) $.
